title: Let's Connect
subHeading: You can easily find me on these Plateform.

plateform.name: Makers Kitchen
plateform.about_it: It's a place where 2k+ Indie Makers, Programmers and Developers around the world growing and build their ideas together

plateform.name: Twitter
plateform.about_it: Evryone know the twitter and the power of some words. So, approx 2 hours/day enjoy haveing on this awesome social network.
